extent: I have just (in the last 1/2 hour) heard Radio Wales refer to the millions of Jews and other minorites including Gypsies and homosexuals who died in the concentration camps
Sentence: Lyn David Thomas Thu , 27 Jan 2005 08:21:22 GMT Re : Holocaust Day On Thu , 27 Jan 2005 08:11:09 GMT I have just ( in the last 1/2 hour ) heard Radio Wales refer to the millions of Jews and other minorites including Gypsies and homosexuals who died in the concentration camps .

extent: the family and loved ones of those who died

mentionArg1.extent: the family and loved ones of those who died

Sentence: Now that 's significant , but compared to the genocide of Jews and Zigeuner it 's not as significant ( though of course to the family and loved ones of those who died every single one is significant ) .

extent: It's "significant" if any group of people is identified for liquidation by the government of the country in which they live, surely
Sentence: It 's " significant " if any group of people is identified for liquidation by the government of the country in which they live , surely ?

extent: as many identifiable individuals from a particular group in the general population

mentionArg2.extent: a particular group in the general population

mentionArg1.extent: as many identifiable individuals from a particular group in the general population

Sentence: If there are n't as many identifiable individuals from a particular group in the general population , then by your significance = headcount yardstick some groups are never ever going to get rated as " significant " .

extent: Most homosexuals arrested during the Nazi era were imprisoned in normal jails

mentionArg1.extent: Most homosexuals arrested during the Nazi era

Sentence: Most homosexuals arrested during the Nazi era were imprisoned in normal jails .

extent: I think the chance of their being only 10000 who were homosexual amongst the how ever million were killed in the camps is rather small

mentionArg1.extent: the how ever million were killed in the camps

Sentence: I think the chance of their being only 10000 who were homosexual amongst the how ever million were killed in the camps is rather small .

extent: Records appear to show that 50000 _men_ were convicted of homosexuality during the Nazi rule, finding out how many were sent to a camp and killed there is more difficult especially as some who were sent to normal jails were transferred to camps at the end of their sentence, but 10-15k seems reasonable
Sentence: Records appear to show that 50000 _men_ were convicted of homosexuality during the Nazi rule , finding out how many were sent to a camp and killed there is more difficult especially as some who were sent to normal jails were transferred to camps at the end of their sentence , but 10-15k seems reasonable Robert
